go_data.justification: Vac1p is thought to act in membrane trafficking as a complex with the Sec1 homologue Vps45p.
Vac1p was originally identified as a gene required for vacuole inheritance and vacuole protein sorting.
Vac1p was originally identified as a gene required for vacuole inheritance and vacuole protein sorting.
Vac1p coordinates Rab and phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase signaling in Vps45p-dependent vesicle docking/fusion at the endosome.
